mapper.select: SELECT A.SHOES_NO , A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO , B.SHOES_CATEGORY_NAME , A.SHOES_MODEL , A.SHOES_PRICE , A.SALES_YN , A.SALES_AMOUNT , A.REAMANING_AMOUNT , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.WINNER_DATE , A.EVENT_END_YN FROM SHOES_INFO A LEFT JOIN SHOES_CATEGORY B ON (A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO = B.SHOES_CATEGORY_NO) ORDER BY A.SHOES_NO DESC

SELECT A.SHOES_NO , A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO , B.SHOES_CATEGORY_NAME , A.SHOES_MODEL , A.SHOES_PRICE , A.SALES_YN , A.SALES_AMOUNT , A.REAMANING_AMOUNT , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.WINNER_DATE , A.EVENT_END_YN , C.SHOES_THUMB_NO , C.ORIGINAL_NAME , C.SAVED_NAME , C.SAVE_PATH , C.FILE_TYPE , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM SHOES_INFO A LEFT JOIN SHOES_CATEGORY B ON (A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO = B.SHOES_CATEGORY_NO) LEFT JOIN SHOES_THUMB C ON (A.SHOES_NO = C.ST_NO) WHERE A.SHOES_NO = #{ shoesNo }

SELECT A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE_NO , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.BLACK_REASON , A.BLACKLIST_YN , A.WITHDRAW_YN , A.BIRTH , A.ROLE FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND A.ROLE = 'MEMBER'

SELECT /* com.theshoes.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectAllNoticeList() */ A.RNUM , A.SHOES_NO , A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO , D.SHOES_CATEGORY_NAME , A.SHOES_MODEL , A.SHOES_PRICE , A.SALES_YN , A.SALES_AMOUNT , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.WINNER_DATE , A.EVENT_END_YN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.SHOES_NO , B.INFO_CATEGORY_NO , B.SHOES_MODEL , B.SHOES_PRICE , B.SALES_YN , B.SALES_AMOUNT , B.START_DATE , B.END_DATE , B.WINNER_DATE , B.EVENT_END_YN FROM (SELECT C.SHOES_NO , C.INFO_CATEGORY_NO , C.SHOES_MODEL , C.SHOES_PRICE , C.SALES_YN , C.SALES_AMOUNT , C.START_DATE , C.END_DATE , C.WINNER_DATE , C.EVENT_END_YN FROM SHOES_INFO C ORDER BY C.SHOES_NO DESC) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow,jdbcType=VARCHAR } ) A LEFT JOIN SHOES_CATEGORY D ON (A.INFO_CATEGORY_NO = D.SHOES_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow, jdbcType=VARCHAR }

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER A LEFT JOIN EVENT B ON (A.MEMBER_ID = B.EVENT_ID) LEFT JOIN SHOES_INFO C ON (B.EVENT_SHOES_ID = C.SHOES_NO) LEFT JOIN WINNER D ON (A.MEMBER_ID = D.WINNER_ID) LEFT JOIN ADDRESS E ON (A.MEMBER_ID = E.ADDRESS_ID)

SELECT /* com.theshoes.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectAllNoticeList() */ A.RNUM , A.MEMBER_ID , A.NAME , A.EMAIL , A.PHONE_NO , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.BLACK_REASON , A.BLACKLIST_YN , A.WITHDRAW_YN , A.BIRTH , A.ROLE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.MEMBER_ID , B.NAME , B.EMAIL , B.PHONE_NO , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.BLACK_REASON , B.BLACKLIST_YN , B.WITHDRAW_YN , B.BIRTH , B.ROLE FROM (SELECT C.MEMBER_ID , C.NAME , C.EMAIL , C.PHONE_NO , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.BLACK_REASON , C.BLACKLIST_YN , C.WITHDRAW_YN , C.BIRTH , C.ROLE FROM MEMBER C ORDER BY C.MEMBER_ID DESC) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow,jdbcType=VARCHAR } ) A WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow, jdbcType=VARCHAR } AND A.ROLE = 'MEMBER'

SELECT B.EVENT_NO , A.NAME , A.MEMBER_ID , C.SHOES_MODEL , C.SHOES_PRICE , E.ADDRESS_ZIP , B.EVENT_STATUS FROM MEMBER A LEFT JOIN EVENT B ON (A.MEMBER_ID = B.EVENT_ID) LEFT JOIN SHOES_INFO C ON (B.EVENT_SHOES_ID = C.SHOES_NO) LEFT JOIN WINNER D ON (A.MEMBER_ID = D.WINNER_ID) LEFT JOIN ADDRESS E ON (A.MEMBER_ID = E.ADDRESS_ID) WHERE A.ROLE = 'MEMBER' AND A.BLACKLIST_YN = 'N' AND A.WITHDRAW_YN = 'N'
